languages.text: В Просторе ходит немало странных слухов, но один из самых удивительных, появившихся на волне славы Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус — миф, что якобы на каждом мире, когда-либо посещенном {mf|им|ей}, люди и объекты могут неожиданно исчезнуть, если окажутся в одной комнате с любым, даже самым обычным на вид зеркалом.

The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.
languages.original_text: В Просторе ходит немало странных слухов, но один из самых удивительных, появившихся на волне славы Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус — миф, что якобы на каждом мире, когда-либо посещенном {mf|им|ей}, люди и объекты могут неожиданно исчезнуть, если окажутся в одной комнате с любым, даже самым обычным на вид зеркалом.

traits.locale_text: The Expanse is full of strange rumours, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged on the wave of fame of von Valancius Rogue Trader. The story goes like this: on every world ever visited by the Rogue Trader, if the object or a person were to enter a room with a mirror, even the most ordinary one, they could suddenly vanish without a trace.

The Expanse is full of strange rumours, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged on the wave of fame of von Valancius Rogue Trader. The story goes like this: on every world ever visited by the Rogue Trader, if the object or a person were to enter a room with a mirror, even the most ordinary one, they could suddenly vanish without a trace.

The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged on the wave of fame of Rogue Trader von Valancius. The story goes like this: on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects might suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even a most ordinary one.

The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged on the wave of fame of Rogue Trader von Valancius. The story goes like this: on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects might suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even a most ordinary one.

The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.

The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区中充斥着各种奇怪的故事，其中最奇怪的是某个与著名的行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯相关的故事。根据故事记载，在行商浪人到访的每个世界中，只要有人或物体与镜子处于同一个房间，这些东西就可能会突然消失，不留一丝痕迹，即便是最普通的镜子也可能会引发这样的异状。
languages.original_text: The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区中充斥着各种奇怪的故事，其中最奇怪的是某个与著名的行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯相关的故事。故事是这样的，在行商浪人到访的每个世界中，只要有人或物体与镜子处于同一个房间，这些东西就可能会突然消失，不留一丝痕迹，即便是最普通的镜子也可能会引发这样的异状。

languages.text: Die Ausdehnung ist voll von merkwürdigen Geschichten, doch eine der bizarrsten tauchte auf, nachdem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} von Valancius berühmt geworden war. Die Geschichte geht so: Auf jeder Welt, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} besuchte, verschwanden plötzlich Personen oder Gegenstände spurlos, wenn sie sich im selben Raum wie ein Spiegel befanden. Selbst, wenn es ein ganz gewöhnlicher Spiegel war.
languages.original_text: The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.

traits.locale_text: Die Ausdehnung ist voll von merkwürdigen Geschichten, doch eine der bizarrsten tauchte auf der Welle des Ruhms auf, den {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} von Valancius genoss. Die Geschichte geht so: Auf jeder Welt, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} besuchte, verschwanden plötzlich Personen oder Gegenstände spurlos, wenn sie sich im selben Raum wie ein Spiegel befanden. Selbst, wenn es ein ganz gewöhnlicher Spiegel war.

languages.text: Les histoires étranges abondent dans les Étendues, mais l'un des récits les plus bizarres émergea dans le sillage de la renommée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius. Selon la légende, sur chaque monde où {mf|il|elle} posait le pied, des personnes ou des objets disparaissaient sans laisser de trace s'ils se trouvaient dans la même pièce qu'un miroir, même des plus ordinaires.
languages.original_text: The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.

traits.locale_text: Les histoires étranges abondent dans les Étendues, mais l'un des récits les plus bizarres émergea dans le sillage de la renommée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius. On raconte que sur chaque monde où {mf|il|elle} posait le pied, des personnes ou des objets disparaissaient sans laisser de trace s'ils se trouvaient dans la même pièce qu'un miroir, même des plus ordinaires.

languages.text: La Extensión está llena de historias extrañas, pero una de las más absurdas surgió del ascenso a la fama de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius. Según la leyenda, en cada mundo que visitó {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, personas y objetos podían desaparecer sin dejar rastro si estaban en una habitación con un espejo, incluso aunque fuera perfectamente normal.
languages.original_text: The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.

traits.locale_text: La Extensión está llena de historias extrañas, pero una de las más absurdas surgió de la fama de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius. Dice así: en cada mundo que visitó {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, personas y objetos podían desaparecer sin dejar rastro si estaban en una habitación con un espejo, incluso aunque fuera perfectamente normal.

languages.text: エクスパンスには奇妙な話がたくさんあるが、その中でも最も奇妙な話のひとつは、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが頭角を現したときのものだ。伝説によると、自由開拓者がどの惑星を訪れても、鏡と同じ部屋にいると、人や物が突然と跡形もなく消えてしまうというのだ。
languages.original_text: The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスには奇妙な話がたくさんあるが、その中でも最も奇妙な話のひとつは、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが頭角を現したときのものだ。伝説によると、自由開拓者がどの惑星を訪れても、鏡と同じ部屋にいると、人や物が突然と跡形もなく消えてしまうというのだ。

languages.text: Enginlik'te çok tuhaf öyküler anlatılır. Hür Tacir von Valancius makam sahibi olduğunda dillendirilen bir tanesi ise diğerlerinden daha da tuhaftır. Efsaneye göre Hür Tacir'in ziyaret ettiği bütün dünyalarda insanlar veya eşyalar, son derece sıradan da olsa bir aynayla aynı odada olduklarında iz bırakmadan aniden yok olurmuş.
languages.original_text: The Expanse is full of strange stories, yet one of the most bizarre tales emerged in the wake of Rogue Trader von Valancius's rise to prominence. According to the legend, on every world the Rogue Trader visited, people or objects would suddenly vanish without a trace if they found themselves in the same room as a mirror, even an utterly ordinary one.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik tuhaf öykülerle doludur ancak Hür Tacir von Valancius üne kavuştuğunda ortaya çıkan bir tanesi diğerlerinden daha da tuhaftır. Efsaneye göre Hür Tacir'in ziyaret ettiği bütün dünyalarda insanlar veya nesneler, son derece sıradan bile olsa bir aynayla aynı odada olduklarında, iz bırakmadan aniden yok oluyordu.
